category.description: Groups logs into high-level application categories.

type.description: Differentiates types of audit events withing a particular category.

serviceId.description: Indicates the service that produced this audit event.

projectId.description: Indicates the customer Project ID with which this audit event is associated.

Source.title: Source
Source.description: Provides metadata about the source from which this audit event originated.

schema.description: Indicates the schema version of this audit event.

timestamp.description: The timestamp at which this audit event was produced, in ISO8601 format.

level.description: A human-readable indication of the severity level of this audit event.

eventId.description: Unique identifier for this audit event.

streamErn.description: The telemetry stream that produced this audit event.

source.description: Provides metadata about the source from which this audit event originated.

AuditEvent.title: AuditEvent
AuditEvent.description: The customer-facing audit log format for the Equinix Telemetry Service.
